item.title: Fly tipping, 12th November
item.description:
Household rubbish has been dumped on the street outside Louisa Close at the weekend, and is now being added to. Workmen sorting a roofing problem in the houses opposite even dumped a long piece of wood/piping there yesterday. Please remove asap.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Iveagh Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Winn's Common covered in litter, 12th November
item.description:
Previously reported, nothing done about it. Bins overflowing, rubbish dumped, dozens of beer cans and bottles in and under bushes, filthy baby wipes, dumped bed base, fireworks, etc. Neglected for weeks. CLEAN IT UP!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Philimore Close, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped mattresses, 12th November
item.description:
Been there for a few days. On the railway bridge pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Asaph Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards not operating....AGAIN!!, 12th November
item.description:
It is now 12:45pm and the bollards at the corner of Villiers St and John Adam St have failed to close again at 12 midday. This is a continual problem which seems to have no solution due to its frequency of occurrence!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, John Adam Street, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light out at night outside 244 Days Lane Sidcup, 12th November
item.description:
The street light outside 244 Days Lane has not worked for a few nights. This means the houses nearby have dark driveways & side accesses which is a worry .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Days Lane, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weekly street cleaning missed on Findon Road N9!, 12th November
item.description:
Reporting Findon Road, Edmonton N9 weekly street cleaning missed both sides of footpath covered in wet leaves and litter. Please can we get street cleaning team to sweep no one seen here on road for over 2 weeks. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Findon Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two loaded bin bags against the wall next to 71 Burrage Place, 12th November
item.description:
Not sure when they appeared. Wasn't out the front yesterday. They are blocking the pavement and causing an eyesore.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Burrage Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weekly street cleaning missed Sutherland Road N9!, 12th November
item.description:
Sutherland Road,, Edmonton N9 has not been swept over 2 weeks now maybe longer wet leaves and litter accumulating across both sides of the road. Leaves are wet and slippery please can we get street cleaning team out to clear this. Also very dangerous to walk on this, particularly if not steady ! Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
